title: Matches Object Properties Based on Function
description: In this lab, we will explore the matchesWith function in JavaScript. The purpose of this lab is to learn how to compare two objects and determine if they contain equivalent property values based on a provided function. We will be using Object.keys(), Array.prototype.every(), and Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty() to accomplish this task.

meta.title: Mastering Object Property Matching with JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the power of the matchesWith function to compare object properties based on custom logic.
meta.keywords: matching, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, object, comparison, javascript lab, property, javascript tutor

steps.title: Matches Object Properties Based on Function
